TopicTitle: Who thinks life support needs to be implemented?

Articles.Content: I for one always looked forward to seeing that in KSP ever since I first bought the game. I think for those who don't want that there could be a setting in the new difficulty menu. I really want to be able in the final game have a 1st person EVA, look at a HUD and see im really low on O2 and have to either make a desperate final RCS shot towards my ship or plan a EVA or mission to save the unconscious Kerbal.

I'm sorry, but Squad has said that this is something they do not want to have in the game, and furthermore, the subject has been rehashed so many times that it has been placed on our list of things not to suggest anymore, to keep forum discussions moving on productive lines. This thread will therefore be closed now.
